That looks OK, maybe you want uid=yourusername on those ntfs ones? Make sure you have read/write permission on the folder /hda1 and stuff to change what's ion them
What I meant anyway was that the FOLDER you were putting it in had write permission (chown yourusername folder) not the device. Anyway I should have spotted the ntfs read only thing
Microsoft haven't told anyone how NTFS actually works (and it's not as simple as fat32) so there are people gradually working it out. So far they know how to get data (read) but not write
